data.comment: Preston kick-off to get the first-half underway.
Darnell Fisher (Preston) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
Reading have kicked-off the second half at Madejski Stadium.
Preston have been given a penalty at Madejski Stadium...
In the minute 65, Preston take a 0-1 lead thanks to Scott Sinclair.
The home team have replaced Sone Aluko with George Puscas. This is the first substitution made today by Veljko Paunovic.
Goal! Emil Riis Jakobsen extends Preston's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 71, Veljko Paunovic (Reading) is making a second substitution, with Sam Baldock replacing Michael Olise.
Veljko Paunovic is making the team's third substitution at Madejski Stadium with Andy Yiadom replacing Tomas Esteves.
Preston make their first substitution with Tom Barkhuizen replacing Scott Sinclair.
In the minute 87, At Madejski Stadium, Josh Laurent has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Alan Browne (Preston) has received a first yellow card.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-3.
Preston take a comfortable 0-3 lead thanks to Brad Potts.
